method.name: _xmpp-client-httppoll
method.syntax: The http: or https: URL at which to contact the HTTP Polling connection manager or proxy

method.name: _xmpp-client-websocket
method.syntax: The ws: or wss: URI at which to contact the WebSocket connection manager or proxy

method.name: _xmpp-client-xbosh
method.syntax: The http: or https: URL at which to contact the HTTP Binding connection manager or proxy
